6e07db2a-3758-48fb-80f7-384cf5434371: Once per day you can take 20 on your next {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g}.
1f7a5390-251b-4e57-9e8b-191c93b3c67a: Three times per day you can drink blood from an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g}, sleeping or {g|ConditionParalyzed}paralyzed{/g} living creatures. You can also drink blood from corpses of living creatures. Whenever you drink blood from such a creature, you gain 5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} plus 5 for every three {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} you have and a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throws{/g}. The effects last 1 hour.
3c2d8355-88fe-430b-9656-9b4bb83a32a2: Whenever you use the Blood Drinker {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you gain a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} and a +1 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics checks{/g}. This bonus lasts for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to 1/2 your {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g}.
43a28c14-6822-45e4-a311-3c1593aa517e: You are {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} by both the channeled positive energy used to heal living creatures, and channeled negative energy used to heal undead, but both only heal half the normal amount. You still take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from positive energy used to harm undead, such as that from channeled energy and lay on hands.
